mdRecord.dcterms:title: A new & correct map of ye whole world / by H. Moll, Geor. is most humbly dedicated to Luke Gardiner Esq. Deputy Vice Treasurer and Receiver General of his Majesties revenue in the kingdom of Ireland, by his most obedient servant G. Grierson
New and correct map of the whole world
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Grierson, George, -1753
Moll, Herman, -1732
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Title is from the unsigned cartouche, which is a mirror image of the one that appeared on Moll's 1719 map. An expanded title appears in a box at lower center.
Insets: [World map], "This chart is to shew degrees of the variation of ye compas's ..." -- The North Pole.
Includes an advertisement directly below the cartouche and an explanation of the scale at lower right.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Handwritten label on verso: Image of the World 2.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: World maps--Early works to 1800.
